Item.name: Diving Knife
Item.description: A Diving Knife is a general purpose tool meant for divers but is usually used by most crew members for personal protection purposes.

Item.name: Vibroblade
Item.description: A power cell powered knife similar to a chainsaw that deals extra damage and bleeding.

Item.name: Thermoblade
Item.description: A battery-powered knife that uses extreme heat to deal extra damage, even to armored targets.

Item.name: Shiv
Item.description: A makeshift knife made from a food can.

Item.name: Polycarbonate Spear
Item.description: Polycarbonate spears are used mainly for Harpoon Gun or Spear Gun training.

Item.name: Aluminium Spear
Item.description: An aluminium spear, which can be used as Harpoon Gun or Spear Gun ammo or as a melee weapon in a pinch.

Item.name: Copper Spear
Item.description: A copper spear, which can be used as Harpoon Gun or Spear Gun ammo or as a melee weapon in a pinch.

Item.name: Bronze Spear
Item.description: A bronze spear, which can be used as Harpoon Gun or Spear Gun ammo or as a melee weapon in a pinch.

Item.name: Lead Spear
Item.description: A lead spear for Harpoon Guns or Spear Guns. They are heavier but still useful as ammo or melee weapons.

Item.name: Steel Spear
Item.description: Steel spears are standard issue ammunition for Harpoon Guns or Spear Guns but they can be used as melee weapons in a pinch.

Item.name: Uranium Spear
Item.description: A uranium spear for Harpoon Guns or Spear Guns. They are heavier but still useful as ammo or melee weapons.

Item.name: Fulgurium Spear
Item.description: A fulgurium spear, which can be used as Harpoon Gun or Spear Gun ammo or as a melee weapon in a pinch.

Item.name: Hollowhead Spear
Item.description: A heavily modified plastic spear with enough room for an explosive charge. This spear is wider than normal ones so it can only be loaded in Harpoon Guns.

Item.name: Harpoon Gun
Item.description: A pneumatic implement designed to fire a spear at underwater creatures. It's meant to be used for hunting but it's usually used for self defense.

RequiredItems.name: spearammo,Hollowhead Spear
RequiredItems.msg: The loaded spear is too damaged

Item.name: Spear Gun
Item.description: A military pneumatic weapon used by security. It can hold up to three spears and it can be deadly in the right, or wrong hands.

RequiredItems.name: spearammo
RequiredItems.msg: The loaded spear is too damaged

Item.name: Polycarbonate Saw
Item.description: A polycarbonate saw. It's practically a waste of resources.

Item.name: Aluminium Saw
Item.description: An aluminium saw. It's useless as a Saw Cutter blade.

Item.name: Copper Saw
Item.description: A copper saw. It's useless as a Saw Cutter blade.

Item.name: Bronze Saw
Item.description: A bronze saw. It's useless as a Saw Cutter blade.

Item.name: Lead Saw
Item.description: A lead saw. This is a custom made blade.

Item.name: Steel Saw
Item.description: A standard issue steel blade used mostly to craft or repair Saw Cutters.

Item.name: Uranium Saw
Item.description: A uranium saw. This is a custom made blade.

Item.name: Fulgurium Saw
Item.description: A fulgurium saw. This is a custom made blade.

Item.name: Saw Gun
Item.description: A makeshift weapon. This is a heavily modified Saw Cutter designed to throw saws instead.

RequiredItems.name: sawammo
RequiredItems.msg: The loaded saw is too damaged

Item.name: Tactical Grenade
Item.description: The tactical grenade is an empty steel casing with a screw-off cap and a trigger mechanism that ignites the containing payload after a certain amount of time.

Item.name: HTM
Item.description: HTM or Hand Thrown Munition, is an enhanced grenade with an electronic priming mechanism that ignites the containing payload after a certain amount of time.

Item.name: Molotov Cocktail
Item.description: This crude incendiary bomb uses thermite for an easy ignition method, making it really unstable.

Item.name: Hot Can
Item.description: This Food Can has been rigged with Thermite, which will ignite the contents on impact. It's very sensitive so it can be set off by accident.

Item.name: Revolver Round
Item.description: Self-propelled revolver rounds designed to work underwater.

Item.name: Revolver HL Round
Item.description: Custom hand-loaded Revolver ammunition. More stopping power but less penetration.

Item.name: Revolver Flare Round
Item.description: Pyrotechnic revolver ammunition. Designed to be used for signalling or illumination.

Item.name: Shotgun Slug Round
Item.description: A shell containing a self-propelled slug.

Item.name: Shotgun Beanbag Round
Item.description: A shell containing a self-propelled pillow filled slug.

Item.name: Shotgun Taser Round
Item.description: A shell containing a self-propelled electrified slug.

Item.name: Gauss Pistol Magazine
Item.description: Gauss magazines are just a casing containing a dense steel bar and a power source to make the pistol work.

Item.name: Gauss Pistol
Item.description: Gauss weapons use magnetic force and mass drivers to generate and propel projectiles the size of a sand grain from a dense bar of metal.

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door,Small Door,Thin Small Door

Item.name: Gauss Carbine Magazine
Item.description: Gauss magazines are just a casing containing a dense steel bar and a power source to make the carbine work.

Item.name: Gauss Carbine
Item.description: Gauss weapons use magnetic force and mass drivers to generate and propel projectiles the size of a sand grain from a dense bar of metal.

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door,Small Door,Thin Small Door

Item.name: Gauss Rifle Magazine
Item.description: Gauss magazines are just a casing containing a dense steel bar and a power source to make the rifle work.

Item.name: Gauss Rifle
Item.description: Gauss weapons use magnetic force and mass drivers to generate and propel projectiles the size of a sand grain from a dense bar of metal.

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door,Small Door,Thin Small Door

Item.name: Gauss Gun
Item.description: A makeshift Gauss weapon. It's not as powerful as military ones but they can propel metal powder grains at lethal speeds.

Containable.name: Vial of Aluminium Powder,Vial of Copper Powder,Vial of Iron Powder,Vial of Uranium Powder,Vial of Fulgurium Powder

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door,Small Door,Thin Small Door

RequiredItems.name: Vial of Aluminium Powder,Vial of Copper Powder,Vial of Bronze Powder,Vial of Iron Powder,Vial of Lead Powder,Vial of Uranium Powder,Vial of Fulgurium Powder
Vial of Aluminium Powder,Vial of Copper Powder,Vial of Bronze Powder,Vial of Iron Powder,Vial of Lead Powder,Vial of Uranium Powder,Vial of Fulgurium Powder

Item.name: Shock Rod
Item.description: A makeshift melee weapon that uses energy cells to deliver an electric shock to the target. The shock can stun but it might be lethal too.

Item.name: Stun Baton
Item.description: If verbal orders are insufficient, a high-voltage shock from a Stun Baton may be enough to beat an unruly crew member into submission.

Item.name: Sonar Blaster
Item.description: A heavily modified personal sonar device designed to produce an intensely loud sonar ping. It can stun both the user and those around for about a second.

Item.name: EMP Blaster
Item.description: A heavily modified personal sonar device designed to produce a powerful but localized EMP field.

Item.name: Plasma Torcher
Item.description: A modified plasma cutter that uses an unstable jet of ionized gas as a crude form of flamethrower.

RequiredItems.name: Oxygen Tank,Oxygenite Tank,Hydrogen Tank,Sulphurite Tank,Thermite Tank

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door,Small Door,Thin Small Door

Item.name: Aluminium Bat
Item.description: A smooth aluminium club used in the Earth sport of baseball. It's an effective melee weapon against people too.

Item.name: Utility Axe
Item.description: Here's Johnny!

Item.name: SMRSL
Item.description: Shoulder-Mounted Railgun Spear Launcher. A weapon to surpass Metal Gear.

Containable.name: Railgun Polycarbonate Spear,Railgun Aluminium Spear,Railgun Copper Spear,Railgun Bronze Spear,Railgun Lead Spear,Railgun Steel Spear,Railgun Uranium Spear,Railgun Fulgurium Spear

RequiredItems.name: Railgun Polycarbonate Spear,Railgun Aluminium Spear,Railgun Copper Spear,Railgun Bronze Spear,Railgun Steel Spear,Railgun Uranium Spear,Railgun Fulgurium Spear
